name: Abundant Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When Abundant Growth enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

name: Alchemist's Apprentice
oracle_text: Sacrifice Alchemist's Apprentice: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Side effects may include foul odors, scalding steam, and spontaneous nonexistence.

name: Amass the Components
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text: "I knew I'd find a use for all that newt spittle!"

name: Angelic Wall
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
flavor_text:
"The air stirred as if fanned by angels' wings, and the enemy was turned aside."
—Tales of Ikarov the Voyager

name: Angel's Mercy
oracle_text: You gain 7 life.
flavor_text: "I understand your fears. I pity your doubts. I absolve you of both."

name: Banners Raised
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: After the destruction of the Helvault, fearful mobs soon became fearless battalions.

name: Battle Hymn
oracle_text: Add {R} for each creature you control.
flavor_text:
"A church is just wood and walls. A congregation is the faithful praising the angels."
—Kolman, elder of Gatstaf

name: Bladed Bracers
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
As long as equipped creature is a Human or an Angel, it has vigilance.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Forged from the rubble of the Helvault.

name: Bloodflow Connoisseur
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodflow Connoisseur.
flavor_text:
"Death not for survival but for vanity and pleasure? This is the decadence I sought to curb."
—Sorin Markov

name: Bone Splinters
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
flavor_text:
"Which do you deserve, the heft of a femur or the graceful sharpness of a forearm? Decisions, decisions . . ."
—Gisa the Mad

name: Borderland Ranger
oracle_text: When Borderland Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "There's only one route from Kessig into Stensia. Unless you come with me."

name: Butcher Ghoul
oracle_text: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: Without a mind, it doesn't fear death. Without a soul, it doesn't mind killing.

name: Call to Serve
oracle_text:
Enchant nonblack creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2, has flying, and is an Angel in addition to its other types.
flavor_text: Grace is a gift, never a reward.

name: Cathedral Sanctifier
oracle_text: When Cathedral Sanctifier enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "Evil will soon be vanquished. What Innistrad most needs now is healing."

name: Cloudshift
oracle_text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text:
"Even storm clouds bow to worship Avacyn."
—Elder Rimheit

name: Crippling Chill
oracle_text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: One breath of the geist turns veins to rivers of ice and freezes hearts midbeat.

name: Crypt Creeper
oracle_text: Sacrifice Crypt Creeper: Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text:
"I guess what they say is true. What doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Or at least stranger."
—Captain Eberhart

name: Cursebreak
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: No longer the village pariah. No longer taunted and shamed. Sigrun was finally free.

name: Dangerous Wager
oracle_text: Discard your hand, then draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"C'mon friend, take a turn tossing the knucklebones. What've you got to lose?"
—Tobias, trader of Erdwal

name: Death Wind
oracle_text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
flavor_text: Leukin stared at the smoldering angel feathers. "Run!" he screamed to his patrol. "We don't stand a chance!"

name: Defang
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.
flavor_text: Once vampires are disarmed, they're given wooden swords and forced to assist in the training of Midnight Duelists.

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
flavor_text:
"To truly defeat a skaberen, you must destroy not the monster but the lab."
—Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

name: Diregraf Escort
oracle_text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Diregraf Escort is paired with another creature, both creatures have protection from Zombies.

name: Dreadwaters
oracle_text: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of lands you control.
flavor_text: Stray into the Morkrut and it may rise to claim you.

name: Driver of the Dead
oracle_text: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: Some vampires resorted to corpse trading after cathars burned their estates and drove them from their ancestral feeding grounds.

name: Elgaud Shieldmate
oracle_text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Elgaud Shieldmate is paired with another creature, both creatures have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Essence Harvest
oracle_text: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
flavor_text: Captain Lewenheart uncovered evidence of a demon cult among the clergy. The Skirsdag never gave him a chance to prove his case.

name: Farbog Explorer
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: "I'd slog through a thousand swamps to help one soul find rest."

name: Fervent Cathar
oracle_text:
Haste
When Fervent Cathar enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: "I'll put my sword down only to die. And I don't plan on doing that today."

name: Fleeting Distraction
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The first spell taught to young mages, it has spared the lives of many whose hands are too small to hold a sword.

name: Flowering Lumberknot
oracle_text: Flowering Lumberknot can't attack or block unless it's paired with a creature with soulbond.
flavor_text:
"It used to eat us trappers. Now it follows us around like some kind of hound dog."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Galvanic Alchemist
oracle_text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Galvanic Alchemist is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{2}{U}: Untap this creature."

name: Geist Snatch
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Create a 1/1 blue Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: Angels and demons aren't the only ones listening to your prayers.

name: Geist Trappers
oracle_text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Geist Trappers is paired with another creature, both creatures have reach.

name: Ghostform
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "There's no such thing as 'impenetrable.'"

name: Ghostly Flicker
oracle_text: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: Sometimes it's useful to take a break from existence.

name: Ghoulflesh
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
flavor_text: The body dies in stages. First the skin, then the muscle. The brain is last, much to the victim's dismay.

name: Grave Exchange
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Target player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text:
"It's a cold, dark journey either way."
—Eruth of Lambholt

name: Grounded
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses flying.
flavor_text:
"We've tracked Ludevic's monster across four provinces. When it lands, make sure it stays put."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig, to Halana of Ulvenwald

name: Gryff Vanguard
oracle_text:
Flying
When Gryff Vanguard enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Ghouls smashed the door, but I heard the call of the gryffs and knew we were saved."
—Ekka, shopkeeper of Hanweir

name: Guise of Fire
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 and attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text:
"Fire will eventually destroy a zombie, but a fiery zombie destroys a lot of other things first."
—Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

name: Hanweir Lancer
oracle_text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Hanweir Lancer is paired with another creature, both creatures have first strike.

name: Havengul Skaab
oracle_text: Whenever Havengul Skaab attacks, return another creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: An abomination so violent that the other fiends tremble at the sight of it.

name: Heirs of Stromkirk
oracle_text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
Whenever Heirs of Stromkirk deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Hunted Ghoul
oracle_text: Hunted Ghoul can't block Humans.
flavor_text: Even after Hanweir was saved, Gisa's lost ghouls would shamble through, still following the twisted orders of their imprisoned master.

name: Joint Assault
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's paired with a creature, that creature also gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"By my power, werewolves shall become the wolfir, our allies in combat against darkness."
—Avacyn's Cursemute Decree

name: Kruin Striker
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Kruin Striker gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Unhappy with the creation of the wolfir, Rorica broke with her order and led a crusade against the "reformed werewolves."

name: Lair Delve
oracle_text: Reveal the top two cards of your library. Put all creature and land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: "The fiends have fled. Well, good riddance. Nothing I like more than an empty lair."

name: Leap of Faith
oracle_text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn.
flavor_text: The finest maneuvers take place in three dimensions.

name: Mad Prophet
oracle_text:
Haste
{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor_text: "There's no heron in the moon! It's a shrew, a five-legged shrew, with a voice like whispering thunder!"

name: Malicious Intent
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Target creature can't block this turn."
flavor_text: As peace returned to Thraben, some cathars made the mistake of letting down their guard.

name: Mental Agony
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor_text: "His mind is feeble. Feed him to the bats."

name: Midnight Duelist
oracle_text: Protection from Vampires
flavor_text: Avacyn's return did not rid him of his desire for revenge.

name: Midvast Protector
oracle_text: When Midvast Protector enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I cultivated my faith in Avacyn despite meager returns. Now my faith is repaid."

name: Mist Raven
oracle_text:
Flying
When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"When you see a raven, head for the hills. It knows when the ghost-tide is headed in."
—Sved, fisherman of Nephalia

name: Moonlight Geist
oracle_text:
Flying
{3}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Moonlight Geist this turn.
flavor_text: Wails and whispers are the only weapons she has left.

name: Moorland Inquisitor
oracle_text: {2}{W}: Moorland Inquisitor gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: Inquisitors are taught scripture, philosophy, and the fine art of sharpening an axe.

name: Narstad Scrapper
oracle_text: {2}: Narstad Scrapper gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Finally, the principles of corpse animation applied to bloodless materials!"
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Natural End
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: The haunted blade shattered, and the geist drifted gratefully to the Blessed Sleep.

name: Necrobite
oracle_text: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. Regenerate it. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat. Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: An undead snake doesn't bite in self-defense. It hungers as any zombie, never sated.

name: Nettle Swine
flavor_text:
"I killed one and found bricks and bones in its belly. It had eaten a whole cottage, thatch and all."
—Paulin, Somberwald trapper

name: Nightshade Peddler
oracle_text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Nightshade Peddler is paired with another creature, both creatures have deathtouch.

name: Outwit
oracle_text: Counter target spell that targets a player.
flavor_text: The student asks how a spell is begun. The master ponders what ends it.

name: Pathbreaker Wurm
oracle_text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Pathbreaker Wurm is paired with another creature, both creatures have trample.

name: Peel from Reality
oracle_text: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: "Soulless demon, you are bound to me. Now we will both dwell in oblivion."

name: Pillar of Flame
oracle_text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: "May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion."

name: Polluted Dead
oracle_text: When Polluted Dead dies, destroy target land.
flavor_text: After the zombie attack, crops withered on the vine, and the thriving village became a ghost town almost overnight.

name: Predator's Gambit
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
Enchanted creature has intimidate as long as its controller controls no other creatures. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

name: Raging Poltergeist
flavor_text: Some tried cremating their dead to stop the ghoulcallers. But the dead returned, furious about their fate.

name: Renegade Demon
flavor_text:
"Have you ever cornered a wounded vampire? That's a walk in the cathedral garden in comparison."
—Tristen, Cathar Marshal

name: Righteous Blow
oracle_text: Righteous Blow deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"Monsters will no longer find safety under the mists of Morkrut!"
—Bruna, Light of Alabaster

name: Riot Ringleader
oracle_text: Whenever Riot Ringleader attacks, Human creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "So the vampires like hot blood, do they? Let's see how they handle ours."

name: Rotcrown Ghoul
oracle_text: When Rotcrown Ghoul dies, target player mills five cards.
flavor_text:
"Don't look into its eyes. It's thinking things no dead thing should think."
—Captain Eberhart

name: Scalding Devil
oracle_text: {2}{R}: Scalding Devil deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Demons massacre. Devils annoy.

name: Scrapskin Drake
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Scrapskin Drake can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
"The cathars killed my skaabs down below. Let's see how high their swords can reach."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Scroll of Avacyn
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Scroll of Avacyn: Draw a card. If you control an Angel, you gain 5 life.
flavor_text: Words to bless the eye that reads them, telling of a future beyond the reach of fear.

name: Scroll of Griselbrand
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Scroll of Griselbrand: Target opponent discards a card. If you control a Demon, that player loses 3 life.
flavor_text: Words no eyes should see, telling of things no sane mind could fathom.

name: Searchlight Geist
oracle_text:
Flying
{3}{B}: Searchlight Geist gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: It rises with the fall of darkness, seeking souls to extinguish.

name: Seraph of Dawn
oracle_text: Flying, lifelink
flavor_text: She parts the clouds so sunlight can reach even the darkest lairs and duskiest tombs.

name: Seraph Sanctuary
oracle_text:
When Seraph Sanctuary enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
Whenever an Angel enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {C}.

name: Sheltering Word
oracle_text: Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Snare the Skies
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: A hunter's precision and a durkvine's strength are a potent combination.

name: Somberwald Vigilante
oracle_text: Whenever Somberwald Vigilante becomes blocked by a creature, Somberwald Vigilante deals 1 damage to that creature.
flavor_text: He has nothing left but his resentment.

name: Soulcage Fiend
oracle_text: When Soulcage Fiend dies, each player loses 3 life.
flavor_text: Vowing to free the souls of her children, Kastinne followed the tormentors into the ghastly network of caves below Stensia.

name: Spectral Gateguards
oracle_text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Spectral Gateguards is paired with another creature, both creatures have vigilance.

name: Spectral Prison
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice Spectral Prison.

name: Terrifying Presence
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by creatures other than target creature this turn.
flavor_text: Elmut had slaughtered vampires, slain werewolves, and destroyed hordes of zombies. Sadly, he never got over his fear of spiders.

name: Thatcher Revolt
oracle_text: Create three 1/1 red Human creature tokens with haste. Sacrifice those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: The dark times left the peasantry ready to fight with whatever weapons were at hand.

name: Thraben Valiant
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: "Once more into Devil's Breach, soldiers. I want another devil tail for my collection."

name: Thunderbolt
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"My next aerial design will use less metal."
—Hadaken, alchemist of Nephalia

name: Timberland Guide
oracle_text: When Timberland Guide enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "Can you build a fire? Track a deer? Identify killer trees? Then you'll never survive Kessig without me."

name: Trusted Forcemage
oracle_text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Trusted Forcemage is paired with another creature, each of those creatures gets +1/+1.

name: Uncanny Speed
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"To survive, we must embrace the savagery we knew in our race's infancy."
—Edgar Markov

name: Undead Executioner
oracle_text: When Undead Executioner dies, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Heartless killer in life, brainless killer in death.

name: Unhallowed Pact
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.

name: Vanguard's Shield
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and can block an additional creature each combat.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Wars are not fought on a single front.

name: Voice of the Provinces
oracle_text:
Flying
When Voice of the Provinces enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
flavor_text: Her horn is heard across Innistrad, lifting the hearts of the righteous.

name: Wandering Wolf
oracle_text: Creatures with power less than Wandering Wolf's power can't block it.
flavor_text: Humans still feared wolves, though no connection between them and the curse of lycanthropy had ever been proved.

name: Wildwood Geist
oracle_text: Wildwood Geist gets +2/+2 as long as it's your turn.
flavor_text: The geists that dwell in the deep forests of Kessig are as untamable as the woods themselves.

name: Wingcrafter
oracle_text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Wingcrafter is paired with another creature, both creatures have flying.

name: Zealous Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Cower, fiend. The night is yours no longer."
